name: Black Knight
overview: Black Knight is a game that will not give you a moment's rest. The computer will take you to the beginning of a scene, then control is handed over to your joystick. From then on YOU are the Black Knight, and you've got to make your move before it's too late. Deadly goblins, sword-fights, venomous snakes, horse riding, precipices, mazes, all animated to a standard previously thought impossible - this game has it all. Make no mistake Black Knight is a breakthrough. This is the first time animation of this quality has ever been seen. It takes 16 sprites to move the Black Knight, up till now, 8 sprites have always been thought to be the most you could get on the Commodore 64. This game will be imitated for a long, long time.
publishers: ECP (Entertainment and Computer Products Pty. Ltd.)
